name: Sisyphean Horse
description:
Backtrace GameJam #3 submission

The game is about a horse that walks up a steep mountain.

Controls:

Movement: arrow keys

Exit: Alt+F4 =)

Restart (after death): Escape

Backtrace: https://swifteg.sp.backtrace.io/p/GameJam

Authors:

2D Art: Anna Slempo annawait16@gmail.com

3D Art: Nick Sukharichev https://mediochrea.itch.io/

Programming: Dmitry Strizhevsky swifteg@gmail.com

Music: @soljarka soljarka@gmail.com

Used assets:

Hawk screeching sound -- Mike Koenig

Horse sounds -- Mixkit

Font -- Southype
